chapter.title: Burning CDs and DVDs
chapter.para: You can make your own CDs by burning files onto a blank disc using the CD writer drive of your computer.
Use the Brasero Disc Burning software to create data, audio and video CDs, copy CDs and DVDs and create CDs from disc image files. Click &brasero; to start Brasero.
For help and instructions, see the Brasero manual.
